item.title: Trump names COVID lockdown critic Dr. Jay Bhattacharya as pick for NIH director
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is nominating a close ally of Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to serve as the head of the National Institutes of Health.

item.title: Israeli Cabinet approves ceasefire deal between Israel and Hezbollah
item.description: The ceasefire went into effect 4 a.m. Wednesday, local time, which was five hours after the ceasefire agreement was announced.
